name: Adventure (itch) (nithelelias)
description:
ADVENTURE

HTML5  Zelda (ADVENTURE Atari) Like Try out 

This will be a Game development from start!

I all ready  re-made a pseudo HTML5 Motor game.

Im using a top down perspective

 

CONTROLS

Moving with arrows.

z- ATTACK

c- TO BOMB

x  - SHIELD

Space - roll
